BR_text.BRsummary: RL4J - A3C throws java.lang.RuntimeException while training [ND4J issue]
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h4>Issue Description</denchmark-h>
 
 Expected behavior
 Application should run without any exceptions provided all dependencies/configurations are setup properly.
 
 Refer to <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/rahul-raj/4cfddf24abf261946ae31193133f65a8>gist</denchmark-link>
  for full exception log.
 Example used for testing -> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/dl4j-examples/blob/master/rl4j-examples/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/examples/rl4j/A3CALE.java>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/dl4j-examples/blob/master/rl4j-examples/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/examples/rl4j/A3CALE.java</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-h:h4>Version Information</denchmark-h>
 
 Please indicate relevant versions, including, if relevant:
 
 Deeplearning4j version -> 1.0.0-beta4
 platform information (OS, etc) -> Windows 10
 CUDA version, if used -> NA
 NVIDIA driver version, if in use -> NA
 
 <denchmark-h:h4>Contributing</denchmark-h>
 
 pong.bin file used -> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NeuroCSUT/DeepMind-Atari-Deep-Q-Learner-2Player/blob/master/roms/pong.bin>https://github.com/NeuroCSUT/DeepMind-Atari-Deep-Q-Learner-2Player/blob/master/roms/pong.bin</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/raver119>@raver119</denchmark-link>
  How should we be replacing that?

comments_1.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/saudet>@saudet</denchmark-link>
 
 In fact, the below is another test example that confirmed the issue:
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/dl4j-examples/blob/master/rl4j-examples/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/examples/rl4j/ALE.java>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/dl4j-examples/blob/master/rl4j-examples/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/examples/rl4j/ALE.java</denchmark-link>
 
 log -> <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/rahul-raj/7c06d543ddaa72e6710086f49a604b3a>https://gist.github.com/rahul-raj/7c06d543ddaa72e6710086f49a604b3a</denchmark-link>

comments_2.comment_text: As we've already discussed in Slack, compression isn't needed anymore, since UINT8 is a regular data type now, so all we need is a casual INDArray.castTo(UINT8) as you move data into history/replays storage, and INDArray.castTo(YourFloatingPointDataType) as you extract data out of it.
